title: http.Error resets Content-Type
body:
Hello All,

The http.Error function resets the content-type to "text/plain; charset=utf-8". Any particular reason why this is done?

If I want to set content-type with any status code I can do it as following:
```
w.Header().Set("Content-Type", "application/json")
w.WriteHeader(400)
```
But I wanted to understand why this is done.
